svg.aria-label: Leopard frog cardiovascular system ventral view
svg.title: Leopard Frog Cardiovascular System — Ventral View
svg.desc: Interactive SVG of a leopard frog 3-chambered heart showing the single ventricle, two atria, conus and truncus arteriosus, three pairs of aortic arches, sinus venosus, and cutaneous circulation for comparative anatomy study.
svg.text: LEOPARD FROG CARDIOVASCULAR SYSTEM — VENTRAL VIEW
Rana pipiens — 3-Chambered Heart with Single Ventricle
AnatoView — Leopard Frog (Rana pipiens) Cardiovascular Model — Comparative Anatomy
3-chambered heart | Single ventricle | Cutaneous respiration | 3 pairs of aortic arches
